# WAError.deviceNoLongerAvailable(_:)

**Case**

An error that occurs if a device is no longer available.

## Declaration

```swift
case deviceNoLongerAvailable(WAError.DeviceNoLongerAvailableDetails)
```

## Checking for unavailable device

- **WAError.DeviceNoLongerAvailableDetails**: The optional details describing the unavailable device.

items.description: The optional details describing the unavailable device.
items.name: WAError.DeviceNoLongerAvailableDetails
